Question: In 1857, his appointment ended at the close of the Pierce administration and the ____ family toured France and Italy.
Hints: She was mostly bedridden until her sister introduced her to this person, after which her headaches seem to have abated.
This person was predominantly a short story writer in his early career.
At the Old Manse, this person wrote most of the tales collected in Mosses from an Old Manse.
